snippet: The collision, in New Jersey, was followed two hours later by a crash between a bus and a truck. Combined, they caused hours of delays for morning commuters.
abstract: The collision, in New Jersey, was followed two hours later by a crash between a bus and a truck. Combined, they caused hours of delays for morning commuters.

headline.main: Bus Crash Near Lincoln Tunnel Injures About 20 and Snarls Commute
